title: Changes in floristic and vegetation structure in a chronosequence of abandoned gold-mining lands in a tropical Amazon forest
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Jorge Garate-Quispe, Ramiro Canahuire-Robles, Gabriel Alarcón-Aguirre, Hugo Dueñas-Linares, Francisco Roman-Dañobeytia
